text: MEET OUR RESPONSIBILITY BOARD We kicked off 2021 with our new responsibility board to help us navigate the ever-evolving landscape of sustainability, we wanted to bring in external voices to keep ourselves accountable and to ensure independent perspectives are represented in our decision making - perspectives that are not tied to GANNIâ€™s financial performance. The board is headed and appointed by Eva Kruse, former CEO at Global Fashion Agenda and includes activist and model Lily Cole, Editor-in-chief of Teen Vogue, Lindsay Peoples Wagner and Founder of The Bear Scouts, Dio Kurazawa.
